definition: to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: Grain to Green Program is an important measure in the treatment of sand and wind source from Tianjin and Beijing areas.
sentences.chinese: 退耕还林是京津风沙源治理工程中的一项重要措施。

sentences.english: The move to return grain for green has got this area back to its former beauty.
sentences.chinese: 退耕还林使这个地区又恢复了昔日的秀美。

sentences.english: Since the implementation of returning farmland to forest policy, the forest canopy.
sentences.chinese: 自从退耕还林政策实施以来，林木郁闭。

sentences.english: The study of the continuation in Qianxi was selected as a study case.
sentences.chinese: 以迁西县为例，对退耕还林的可持续性进行了研究。

sentences.english: Good results were achieved in projects for reforesting formerly cultivated land and protecting natural forests.
sentences.chinese: 退耕还林和天然林保护工程建设取得成效。

sentences.english: The best way to undo the problem of soil erosion is to reforest the cultivated land.
sentences.chinese: 解决水土流失问题的最好办法是退耕还林。

definition: Green Wall of China, a massive afforestation program on the eastern margin of the Gobi Desert aimed at stopping the desert's expansion, started in 1978 and planned to be completed by 2050
to lie idle (of arable land)/fig. rusty because of lack of practice
hilly land allotted for private use
